mods:mods.note: Worth Quoting was made possible by Florida Community College at Jacksonville. The series was recorded from 1985 to 2005, and features a powerful collection of interviews. The content of Worth Quoting represent the views of those being interviewed, and do not necessarily represent the opinions or view of Florida State College at Jacksonville.
